typography.instructions: Use Libre Baskerville for all Headings (H1-H3) to evoke tradition and trust. Use Manrope for body text and numbers for maximum legibility. Ensure base font size is at least 18px for senior readability.

usage.primary: Main headings, Footer background, Primary Buttons (hover state)
usage.text_secondary: Subtitles, less important text (ensure high contrast)

colors.accessibility_check: Ensure all text on colored backgrounds meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 ratio). Avoid low-contrast gray text.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid Mode A (Simplified for Seniors)
layout.spacing: Generous (p-8 to p-12) to prevent clutter

sections.hero: Split layout: Value Prop + Trust Signals (Left) vs Warm Human Imagery (Right). Prominent WhatsApp CTA.
sections.services: Grid of 4 large cards. High contrast icons. Clear titles.
sections.requirements: Checklist style. Large legible list items with check icons.
sections.contact: Map, Large Phone Numbers, Email, Physical Address.

cards.style: Clean, white background, subtle shadow (shadow-md), rounded-xl. Border-t-4 border-accent for visual pop.

navigation.style: Sticky header. White background. Clear, large links. 'Contact' button prominent.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle paper grain or noise overlay on 'Secondary' background sections to reduce digital harshness.
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone or Fill). Large size (w-8 h-8 or w-12 h-12).
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows. Avoid sharp, harsh drops.

media.image_style: Authentic, warm, high-quality. Real people, not cartoons. Focus on 'Peace of Mind'.

accessibility.contrast: Strict adherence to WCAG AA. Text must be #334155 or darker on white.
accessibility.font_size: Minimum body size 18px. Minimum input text size 16px (to prevent zoom on mobile).
accessibility.touch_targets: Buttons and links must be at least 44x44px.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Light Mode' only design. Dark mode is not suitable for this demographic.
Use the 'Manrope' font for body and 'Libre Baskerville' for headings. Import them via Google Fonts.
Ensure the WhatsApp button is floating and visible at all times on mobile.

Do not use gradients for text. Keep it solid and high-contrast.
Use 'lucide-react' or 'phosphor-icons' for icons. Avoid abstract AI emojis.
Create a 'design_system.js' or similar to centralize these constants if possible, or apply directly via Tailwind classes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
